dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of pairs of intended referents and contexts, with respect to which the referents should be identified by their distinctive attributes.
dcterms:title: Discriminative Attribute Dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Silberer
V. Ferrari
M. Lapata
dcterms:description: A dataset containing per-concept attributes for 500 concrete concepts spanning across different categories, annotated with general attributes.
dcterms:title: Visual Attributes for Concepts Dataset (ViSA)

dcterms:creator: J. Deng
W. Dong
R. Socher
L.-J. Li
L. Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: A large-scale hierarchical image database used for various computer vision tasks.
dcterms:title: ImageNet

dcterms:creator: S. Kazemzadeh
V. Ordonez
M. Matten
T. L. Berg
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of referring expressions denoting objects in natural images, used for evaluating models of reference.
dcterms:title: ReferIt Dataset
